## loadData

```{r include=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(fig.pos = 'H')

library(MotifBinner2)

if (!exists('result'))
{
  result <- all_results[[grep('loadData', names(all_results))[1]]]
}
if (class(result) != 'loadData')
{
  result <- all_results[[grep('loadData', names(all_results))[1]]]
}
```

`r length(result$kept)` files were sucessfully loaded.

The number of reads per file:
```{r}
tmp <- lapply(result$kept, length)
kable(data.frame('data set' = names(tmp),
                 'n reads' = as.numeric(tmp),
                 check.names=F,
                 row.names=NULL))
```

```{r, results='asis'}
kable_summary(result$summary)

timingTable(result)
```
